# General Contractor Standing Offer
## Tender Overview

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) has issued a Request for Standing Offer for a General Contractor to provide construction, alteration, and urgent repair services at various CSC institutions in Edmonton, Alberta.

### Key Dates

* Publication Date: February 6, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: February 22, 2023 by 2:00 PM EST
* Expected Contract Start Date: March 1, 2023

### Service Requirements

The General Contractor will be responsible for providing services to the following CSC institutions:

* Grierson Centre
* Edmonton Institution for Women
* Edmonton Maximum Security Institution

Services will include, but are not limited to:

* Construction
* Alterations
* Urgent repairs

### Evaluation Criteria

The tender will be awarded to the lowest bidder.

### Important Notes

* This tender replaces a previously posted Ariba Discovery posting response deadline and CanadaBuys posting closing time.
* All supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by 2:00 PM EST on February 22, 2023. Late submissions will be deemed non-responsive.

### Contact Information

* Kwan, Eric - [eric.kwan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:eric.kwan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Procurement Details

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Procurement Category: CNST (Construction Services)
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Delivery: Edmonton, Alberta
